Package at.tuwien.ifs.commons.gui.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DocumentAdapter
    An abstract adapter class for receiving document events; this class exists as convenience for creating listener objects that react in the same way to insert and remove updates.
    Therefore, both DocumentAdapter.insertUpdate(DocumentEvent) and DocumentAdapter.removeUpdate(DocumentEvent) call DocumentAdapter.performAction(DocumentEvent), DocumentAdapter.changedUpdate(DocumentEvent) is empty.
    MaximisedJFrame
    A JFrame that will be maximised in size
    MultiLineJLabel
    Simulates a multi-line JLabel by a TextArea that is not focusable, and has no border.
